title: Composable Interventions for Language Models
details: A Kolbeinsson, K O'Brien, T Huang, S Gao, S Liu… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Test-time interventions for language models can enhance factual accuracy, mitigate harmful outputs, and improve model efficiency without costly retraining. But despite a flood of new methods, different types of interventions are largely developing …
